text: Rumbia LRT Station is a light rail transit station in Sengkang, Singapore. It is part of the Sengkang LRT Line. It is on its east loop. It opened on 18 January 2003. == Name == The station's name comes from the 2 types of rumbia plants. == Sources == == Other websites == https://www.sbstransit.com.sg Category:Sengkang Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Rumbia LRT Station
